name: Seaside Fort Defense
description:
- 03.10.1869 -

Yesterday I finally found Rolly Joger's hidden treasure. But I wasn't the only one after te treasure. Greybeard and his crew are following me. I found an abandoned fort that I can hide in. I have enough food to survive at lest 2 weeks. 

- 06.10.1869 -

That damn Greybeard found my fort somehow. I don't think I can escape from here. My only option is fighting. I think I saw some cannons in basement. They should be some ammunition too.  From now on it's win or die.

Play as the legendary pirate captain Sack Jarrow as he is cornered inside an abandoned fort and fight aginst Greybeard and his crew. Use cannons to do some pew pew and never forget what your mother told you when you were a child, "Don't forget to cover your ears if there is a cannon shot nearby, if you don't wanna be deaf that is."
